articles.title: Kim Jong Un Clarifies WPK's Firm Will to Build Reunified Thriving Nation, Tightly Holding Arms of Songun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Clarifies WPK's Firm Will to Build Reunified Thriving Nation, Tightly Holding Arms of Songun 
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un made a speech at the banquet given in celebration of August 25, the anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 He said August 25 marks the 52nd anniversary of great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership, adding that Kim Jong Il, totally dedicating himself with his patriotic will, holding high the banner of Songun all his life, built up an invincible military power and provided the might of the great unity between the army and people to be envied by the whole world and thus placed the dignity of the country and its people on the highest level in the history of the nation. These exploits will remain shining forever, he stressed.
					
					 He, reflecting the unanimous desire of all the service personnel of the KPA and people, paid highest tribute and extended eternal glory to Kim Jong Il, who dedicated himself to Songun journeys for patriotic devotion to the country and its people, burning his heart with warmth and love for them all his life.
					
					 "I am pleased to be amongst you comrades-in-arms in the eastern sector of the front on this significant day at a time when the enemies are busy with provocative drills for a war of aggression under our nose," he said, and continued:
					
					 "August 25, along with April 25, is a historic day to go down in the history of the building of our revolutionary armed forces and the history of our country. The might of the KPA proud of being a powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu with tremendous capability and the dignity of our country, a world-class military power and a full-fledged nuclear weapons state, would be unthinkable without this day.
					
					 It is the firm determination and will of the Workers' Party of Korea to defend the security of the country and the gains of revolution and build a reunified thriving nation on this land, tightly holding the arms of Songun provided by Generalissimo Kim Jong Il with so much effort, making journeys for the Songun revolutionary leadership all his life.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet army are staging large-scale war drills for aggression targeted against us even with forces of their allies involved, posing a grave threat to our security.
					
					 During my inspection of units on the forefront in the southwestern sector of the front I already issued an order to the KPA to keep itself highly alerted against the reckless moves of the enemies and follow them with high vigilance. If the enemies fire even a single shell on our inviolable territory and territorial waters, the KPA should deal prompt deadly blows at them and the whole army should turn out as one and lead the battle to an all-out counter-offensive for accomplishing the great cause of national reunification. I issued this order to the whole army and examined the operational plan for implementing it and finally signed it. 
					
					ã€€The courageous officers and men of the KPA, upon receiving this order, occupied their battle positions to cope with the reckless moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces and are now waiting for a final order for charge for a life-and death-battle against the enemies. 
					
					  There is a limit to our patience.
					
					  'Counter a provocation with a prompt counterattack and a war of aggression with a great, just war for national reunification!' This is our principled stand and steadfast will.
					
					  We will not remain an onlooker to the enemies' frantic moves for aggression but make every possible effort to protect the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					 It is the truth proved by history that no force on earth can overpower the people who are all out for the cause of justice.
					
					 If another war breaks out on this land due to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' intolerable actions, though we does not want it, the war will only bring a shameless doom to them and our great nation will greet a new bright day of national reunification.
					
					 Only victory and glory will be in store for us advancing under the uplifted immortal banners bearing portraits of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il with broad smile on their face.
					
					 Availing myself of this meaningful opportunity, I would like to renew once again the firm resolution to steadfastly and invariably keep to the path of Songun traversed by Comrade Kim Jong Il, arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder with you, for our country and revolution." 
					
					  A rosy future is in store for the Korean people, he said, calling for holding more tightly the arms of revolution to protect their happiness and safety and the dignity of the power of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Un proposed a toast to the final victory of the revolutionary causes of Juche and Songun pioneered by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and led by them successfully, to the health of the commanders and commanding officers of combined units and all servicepersons present and to the victorious advance of the powerful revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Banquet Given to Celebrate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
Banquet Given to Celebrate Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Central Military Commission of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK hosted a banquet on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the NDC who is inspecting the eastern sector of the front, was present at the banquet.
					
					 When Kim Jong Un appeared in the banquet hall together with his wife Ri Sol Ju, all the participants enthusiastically welcomed them.  
					
					 They extended highest glory and warmest thanks to the Supreme Commander, who is inspecting the eastern sector of the front to decisively frustrate the enemies' frantic moves for a new war, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation.
					
					  Kim Jong Un made a speech at the banquet.
					
					  Present at the banquet were officials of the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the NDC of the DPRK, commanding officers of the ground, naval, air and anti-air and strategic rocket forces of the KPA and commanders of combined units in the eastern sector of the front.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Field Performance Given by Moranbong Band to Celebrate August 25
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Field Performance Given by Moranbong Band to Celebrate August 25
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, who is inspecting the eastern sector of the front, enjoyed together with KPA service personnel a field performance given by the Moranbong Band to celebrate the August 25, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un appeared in auditorium together with his wife Ri Sol Ju.
					
					 Among the audience were senior party and army officials including Choe Ryong Hae, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Kyong Hui, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Hyon Chol Hae, Kim Won Hong, Ri Myong Su, O Kuk Ryol and Kim Chang Sop, commanding officers of the ground, naval, air and anti-air and strategic rocket forces of the KPA, commanders of the combined units in the eastern sector of the front, airmen and soldiers of the Kamnamu Company (a company under persimmon trees).
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as light music and song "Victors", light music "Look at Us", female quartet "You Are Mother", and female sextet "Let's Sing of Party".
					
					 The performers made an impressive artistic representation of the fact that it was thanks to the great exploits of Kim Jong Il who protected the destiny of the country and the nation and glorified socialist Korea as an invincible power with his Songun politics that there are the great tradition and heritage for carrying forward the cause of the Songun revolution, the basic blood vein of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 The performance made the stage and auditorium prevail with enthusiasm and joy as it was characterized by a good harmony in all elements for musical representation and replete with revolutionary and militant spirit.
					
					 When female sextet "Song of Coastal Artillery Women" was presented, the soldiers of the above-said company mounted the stage and joined the performers in singing the song, strikingly demonstrating their stamina to deal retaliatory sledge hammer blows at the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces getting frantic in their war drills to block the advance of the DPRK.
					
					 The Supreme Commander recognized familiar soldiers of the company and showed his thumb in appreciation of their singing. He extended warm congratulations to the dynamic and optimistic soldiers.
					
					 Their repertoire also included new songs such as female solo and pangchang "Golden Cushion", female quartet "Let's Dash Ahead toward Morrow" and female duet and pangchang "Let's Become Roots".
					
					 The performance reached its climax when female solo and pangchang "Ardent Wish", a new song reflecting the mind of all servicepersons and people wishing for the good health of            Kim Jong Un, who is making a long journey of field guidance to KPA units, was presented and his benevolent image was projected on the screen. 
					
					 The performance ended with female sextet "Our Leader Loved by People".

articles.title: Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Should Not Be Allowed in S. Korea: CPRK Secretariat
articles.content:
Revival of "Yusin" Dictatorship Should Not Be Allowed in S. Korea: CPRK Secretariat
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) released information bulletin No. 1008 Saturday.
					 It says:
					
					 Evidence proving the truth behind the killing of Jang Jun Ha by "yusin dictatorial regime" decades ago has been disclosed, touching off towering indignation of the south Koreans.
					
					 Jang was a renowned dissident figure who had fought against the Syngman Rhee dictatorial regime and Park Chung Hee military fascist clique while conducting progressive literary activities in south Korea since right after August 15 liberation of Korea.
					
					 He fought for democracy and reunification in direct stand-off with "yusin" dictator until his mysterious death in August 1975.
					
					 The "yusin" dictatorial regime announced that he fell off a cliff during mountaineering to meet death. But no one believed it and his bereaved families and relevant organizations of south Korea demanded several times the probe into the truth but the case has remained unsettled due to the obstructions of the conservative regime of south Korea.
					
					 But when transferring his remains to the newly arranged "Jang Jun Ha Park" shortly ago, it was found that the skull had a hole and crack and analysis proved that they were caused by hammer.
					
					 This has brought to light the truth behind the death of Jang Jun Ha 37 years ago.
					
					 The Democratic United Party and other opposition parties and people of all social standings are strongly denouncing the "yusin" dictatorial regime for its atrocity, and urging Park Geun Hye to resign as a "presidential candidate". Jang's bereaved families are strongly demanding the probe into the truth.
					
					 Much upset by this, the conservative regime is resorting to a sleight of hand to divert public criticism, saying that "Jang Jun Ha's case has already been resolved" and "further investigation will bring nothing different".
					
					 Jang Jun Ha's case is another living proof of the "yusin" regime's atrocity and ferocity.
					
					 The "yusin" dictator orchestrated lots of politically-motivated terrorist cases including abduction of Kim Dae Jung, case of the People's Revolutionary Party and case of the National Democratic Youths and Students League. Jang Jun Ha was just one of millions of those victims.
					
					 The south Koreans' grudge against the "yusin" dictator is now running high.
					
					 The crimes committed by the "yusin" fascist dictator must be settled and south Korea should never be allowed to go back to the nightmare-like "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 South Koreans should turn out to wipe out the fascist dictators including the descendents of "yusin" who try to reverse history and go against the times.

articles.title: DPRK FM Leaves for Iran
articles.content:
DPRK FM Leaves for Iran
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun and his party left here Saturday to participate in the ministerial meeting to be held before the 16th summit of the non-aligned countries in Iran.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK led by Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Federation for the Protection of the Disabled of Korea, left here by air Saturday to take part in the 14th Paralympics now under way in London. 
					 A delegation of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association led by Chairman So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, returned home Friday after visiting Amur Region of Russia.

articles.title: Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Youth Delegates
articles.content:
Homage Paid to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il by Youth Delegates
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The delegates to the celebrations of Youth Day laid  floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Saturday, reflecting the unanimous loyalty of all members of the young vanguard from across the country.
					 They paid tribute to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu who put up the slogan "Love the Young People!" and led them with deep loving care to grow up to be performers of feats to go down in history and vanguard fighters in the era.

articles.title: Youth Highly Regarded
articles.content:
Youth Highly Regarded in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung inaugurated the Young Communist League of Korea on August 28, 1927. Since then the name of youth has been considered as a pronoun of the immortal feats, heroic struggle and great pride of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK in the history of the Juche revolution. 
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the name of youth shined with the highest dignity and honor in the history of the WPK and the country. 
					
					 He saw to it that the day when the YCLK was founded was marked as Youth Day and he personally handed over the torch of the revolution to the youth at a rally celebrating the 50th anniversary of the WPK held at Kim Il Sung Square. 
					
					 He made sure that the birth of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League was proclaimed at the conference of the League of Socialist Working Youth of Korea held in January 1996 and personally awarded the flag of the youth league bearing the image of the President to it. 
					
					 The President called the youth the vanguard of the revolution for the first time in history. True to his intention, Kim Jong Il granted to the youth league the greatest title of reliable political reserve of the WPK and reserve combat unit and detached force of the supreme commander. 
					
					 The Korean youth had the honor of receiving the precious titles such as human bullets and bombs devotedly defending the leader and the country, eternal companions of the party, staunch protectors, able builders and reliable defenders of socialism, flowers of the country and the nation and the most vital unit of society in the course of glorifying the noble titles given by the peerless Songun commander. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize, top prizes for the Korean youth, were instituted in the DPRK. 
					
					 Young people have grown up to be patriotic and loyal fighters and performers of feats to beautifully record the name of youth in the history of the country in the course of glorifying Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's idea of attaching importance to the youth and their leadership exploits. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize has been awarded to nearly 900 organizations of the youth league and more than 10 000 young people over the last four decades. Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize has been conferred upon at least 110 since February this year. 
					
					 A dynamic movement for winning the title of O Jung Hup-led 7th Regiment is now under way at the Korean People's Army. Flags of the youth shock brigades are fluttering in all work sites for a great surge. 
					
					 Many sub-units of the KPA, schools and villages have young heroes in their names. 
					
					 There appeared Songnam Youth Coal Mine in the 1950s. Since then a lot of industrial establishments, railway sections, and railway stations came to have the word youth in their names. 
					
					 A lot of power stations that sprang up in different parts of the country had word youth in their names. 
					
					 The word youth was attached to the names of parks, theatres, hotels, streets and even forests of the country. This is the pride of the era of the WPK which values and loves the youth most. 
					
					 The word youth is most highly regarded in the era of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The young people deem it greatest honor and happiness to hold Marshal Kim Jong Un, another sun of Songun, in high esteem as they are celebrating with splendor the first Youth Day in the new century of Juche on his initiative and amid his blessings. They are filled with revolutionary enthusiasm to uphold his leadership with loyalty.

articles.title: Youth Day to Be Marked Significantly in DPRK
articles.content:
Youth Day to Be Marked Significantly in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Events began to take place with splendor here on Saturday in celebration of the Youth Day.
					 The day of the formation of the Young Communist League of Korea (August 28, 1927) was instituted as Youth Day in the DPRK.
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un initiated grandly celebrating the upcoming Youth Day and invited youth representatives to Pyongyang from across the country to take part in the celebrations.
					
					 In the DPRK the Youth Day is celebrated as an auspicious holiday.
					
					 The ongoing celebrations will give a glimpse of the fact that the country is attaching big importance to its young people.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il always attached great importance to the youth in their lifetime.
					
					 The President organized the Young Communist League of Korea under the idea of "Down-with-Imperialism" to usher in a new history of the youth movement in Korea.
					
					 He founded the Democratic Youth League of North Korea on January 17, Juche 35 (1946), which embraced young people of various social strata under the banner of democracy. 
					
					 Soon after the country's liberation from the Japanese colonial rule, he had Kim Il Sung University and a school for children of revolutionary martyrs built and he recalled the students, who were fighting in the front, to the rear to make them continue their study in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Kim Jong Il had the Youth Day instituted and saw to it that the youth league was renamed the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, with its flag bearing a picture of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He published the works "Young Men and Women, Be the Vanguard Unfailingly Loyal to the Party and the Leader" and "Let Young People Highly Exalt the Honor of Young Vanguard in Songun Era by Carrying Forward the Tradition of Youth Movement of Juche", in which he called on the young people to make fresh innovations in the efforts for the country's development, mindful of the duty entrusted to them by the times.
					
					 Inspired by his deep care, the local young people built up many monumental edifices by themselves, including the Youth Hero Motorway and the Kumjingang Hungbong Youth Power Station.  
					
					Kim Jong Un is now paying deep attention to the young people of the country.
					
					 In January this year, he sent an autographic letter "The Building of a Thriving Nation Will Be Accelerated by the Vigorous Drive of the Youth. Always Advance Straight Forward Following the Party!" to officials of the youth league.
					
					 Now the young people of the DPRK are working hard to greet the Youth Day with signal achievements.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youth and Students Held
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in various parts of the DPRK Saturday on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 At the venues of the dancing parties here including the plazas in front of the Party Founding Memorial Tower, the April 25 House of Culture and Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, youth and students presented dances, reflecting the ardent yearning for Kim Jong Il who led the army and people of the DPRK only to the road of victory.
					
					 Their dances became more cheerful and enthusiastic when bands played such songs as "Our General Is the Best", "His Ideal" and "Let Young People Advance Following Party."
					
					 They enthusiastically danced, singing songs including "Let Us Become the General's Soldiers" and "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un with Our Lives".
					
					 Dancing parties held in Hamhung, Wonsan and various other places fully demonstrated the firm will of the members of the Songun young vanguard waging a dynamic struggle to achieve a final victory, united close around the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Lauded by Chief of Korean Youth Organization in China
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Lauded by Chief of Korean Youth Organization in China
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is a brilliant commander possessed of matchless courage and pluck and noble traits.
					 Kim Yong Nyo, chairperson of the Federation of Korean Youth in China, participating in the celebrations of Youth Day, said this when interviewed by KCNA Saturday.
					
					 She continued:
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un inspected the defence detachments of the Korean People's Army on far-flung islets from where the enemy positions were clearly visible.
					
					 He issued the following order to the service personnel of the KPA: If the enemies fire even a single shell at the territory of the DPRK, they should deal prompt deadly counter-blows at the enemies and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification.
					
					 This was a bomb-like declaration heralding a doom of the enemies. I feel relieved after hearing his order and I also feel as if the day of national reunification were near at hand.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have a proud history in which they won a victory on July 27.
					
					 All the service personnel and people, closely united around the dear respected Marshal, will mercilessly punish the enemies.
					
					 None of the war maniacs will survive a retaliatory sacred war launched by the revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 When watching Kim Jong Un instilling strength and courage into servicepersons at forefront posts, I was convinced that the DPRK, our motherland, has already won. 
					
					 If the enemies dare attack our country, they will never escape a doom.
					
					 We, young Koreans in China, are filled with enthusiasm to turn out in a sacred war for crushing the enemies alongside the compatriots at home.
					
					 Our country of Songun is invincible as it is under the great brilliant commander.

articles.title: Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Enjoy Extravaganza "Arirang"
articles.content:
Delegates to Celebrations of Youth Day Enjoy Extravaganza "Arirang"
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Delegates to the celebrations of Youth Day enjoyed mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, at May Day Stadium Saturday.
					 Among the audience were service personnel, people from all walks of life, youth and students, overseas Koreans and foreign guests and the delegates.
					
					 The performance mesmerized the audience from its very beginning as it made a grand epic representation of the past and present of the Korean nation and its eternal prosperity in the future.
					
					 The performers highly praised the undying exploits of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who built on this land the socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, and demonstrated the national dignity and power before the whole world.
					
					 The performance deeply touched the audience for depicting the construction of the Huichon Power Station, the People's Theatre and other grand edifices and scenes that show the Workers' Party of Korea's love for people and future with new music, changes of formation and spectacular display and showing.

articles.title: Song "Fly High, Our Party Flag" Encourages DPRK People
articles.content:
Song "Fly High, Our Party Flag" Encourages DPRK People
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The song "Fly High, Our Party Flag", created nearly 30 years ago, is heard nowadays everywhere in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Choe Jun Hyok, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "Whenever I hear the song, I think of the flag of the Workers' Party of Korea, as well as the history of the Korean revolution that has triumphantly advanced along the road of Juche.
					
					 The flag represents the spirit of socialist Korea standing firm against the U.S.-led imperialists."
					
					 Pang Sun Nyo, a section chief of the Hydro-meteorological Service, said:
					
					 "The song reminds me of the WPK flag, which mirrors the whole life of leader Kim Jong Il, who always held fast to the principle of independence and Songun (military-first) line in any adversity in the whole period of guiding the Korean revolution.
					
					 With the flag held high, Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul for the prosperity of the country, making ceaseless inspection tours of army units and providing field guidance to industrial establishments."
					
					 Ri Nam Il, a teacher at Kim Il Sung University, said:
					
					 "Singing the song 'Fly High, Our Party Flag', we will steadfastly carry forward the traditions of the WPK, united around the leader."

articles.title: Papers Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership
articles.content:
Papers Mark Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership 
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers in the DPRK editorially mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Kim Jong Il began his Songun revolutionary leadership by providing field guidance to Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in its editorial says that his historic field guidance was an expression of his unshakable will to advance the Korean revolution along the road of Songun paved by President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Kim Jong Il invariably traversed the road of the Songun revolution, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation for more than half a century since then, the editorial notes, and goes on:
					
					 It is thanks to the Songun revolution, the cause of immortalizing the leader has been successfully accomplished and victory achieved in the struggle to defend socialism and the DPRK emerged an invincible great power with the matchless revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and war deterrent and a country where astonishing changes are taking place amid the drive for a new great revolutionary surge. 
					
					 The history of the Songun revolution led by Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 It is the revolutionary faith of Kim Jong Un that the eternal strategy for the Korean revolution and a final victory are guaranteed when all service personnel and people are advancing straight along the road of independence, Songun and socialism paved by the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 They will advance along the way of Songun indicated by the Generalissimos full of conviction of victory, closely rallied around Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that a final victory is sure to be won as they are demonstrating the spirit of the power of Mt. Paektu before the whole world under the uplifted banner of Songun, eternally glorifying the Songun leadership exploits of the Generalissimos.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Provocations Aimed at War
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces U.S. Provocations Aimed at War
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. secretary of the Army visited south Korea like a burglar for three nights and four days from August 16.
					 He emphasized the strategic importance of the Korean Peninsula and called for "examining the capabilities of the U.S. forces in south Korea for containing the north". He even said that there is no change in the U.S. commitment to south Korea.
					
					 He visited not only units of the U.S. forces in south Korea but the joint security areas in Panmunjom and had a confab on war exercises with the commander and the deputy commander of the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Forces Command" and the commander of the U.S. 8th Army.
					
					 These dangerous actions remind one of the Seoul trip of warmonger Dulles just before the provocation of the Korean war in June 1950.
					
					 The Army secretary entered even an underground air raid commanding center to be used by the U.S. forces in south Korea in the wartime only. His trip was the field examination by a war chief before launching a war.
					
					 This also proved that Ulji Freedom Guardian (UFG) is not a simple military drill but a war rehearsal carefully planned under the supervision of the U.S. Administration and the Defense Department.
					
					 UFG is apparently the final abrogation of the Korean Armistice Agreement and a U.S. test war for launching the second Korean war.
					
					 All factors of UFG such as its codename, scale, program and the timeline have been carefully worked out by the U.S. warmongers aimed at a war and have been finally field-examined.
					
					 Moreover, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime directly linked the issue of transferring the wartime operational control to the on-going war rehearsal, calling the exercises "combined drills of new form in which the south Korean army spearheads the operations and the U.S. forces render support to them." This is aimed to cover up the aggressive nature of the U.S.-led military drills.
					
					 Just before the start of the June 25 war the U.S. handed over the prerogative of the supreme command of the army to the Syngman Rhee regime and staged the farce of "U.S. forces' pullout" of south Korea. 
					
					 The "field observation" by the members of the now defunct "Neutral Nations Supervision Committee", the participation of military personnel of the former U.S. allies in the drills and other moves for the abuse of "UN" name are just a farce to set the stage for another Korean war.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean warmongers deserve censure of the international community as they run reckless to ignite an aggression war, oblivious of the historical lesson.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK have already received the order of the great illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu. If the enemies drop even a flare of fire in the area of the DPRK side, its armed forces will never miss the opportunity and lead it to a great war for national reunification. They are now replete with this will of annihilating the enemy.
					
					 This war will be a praiseworthy one of removing the root cause of all evils that harass the world and an admirable military exploit to shine long in history.
					
					 The heroic Korean People's Army and the Korean people who have inherited the ever-victorious tradition by defeating two formidable imperialisms in one generation will clearly show the world that they really meant when they declared they will do.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams Japan for Denying History
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams Japan for Denying History 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more undisguised in denying the crime of the sexual slavery.
					 Osaka Mayor Hashimoto and Tokyo Metropolitan Governor Ishihara at press interviews on August 21 and 24 made a string of remarks totally denying the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 They said "where is evidence proving that the Japanese army forced women into sexual slavery?" and "there is no evidence proving that comfort women were walked away, being violated and threatened by the Japanese army ", adding that "this is Japan's view and my view also."
					
					 These shameless comments revealing once again the Japanese reactionaries' moral vulgarity to deny the past crime are an intolerable insult to the women who had their rights seriously trampled at the hand of the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists had gone desperate for continental aggression in the last century. They abducted women of Korea and several other countries and taken them away to reduce them to sexual slaves, a hideous crime against humanity. This is a historical fact that no one can deny.
					
					 But the Japanese reactionaries have neither admitted nor apologized for the crime. They are resorting to the whole gamut of trickery to cover up the past blood-stained history, totally denying and distorting it.
					
					 They called the history of the sexual slavery "history of toilet room" and even said that "'comfort women were engaged in the prostitution with permission and that kind of thing was a worldwide happening at that time."
					
					 They described the survivors' outcry as "remarks of those professing to be victims" and labeled testimony of those who were involved in the crime as "story concocted by liars".
					
					 They are making particular efforts to deny the 1993 Kono statement which officially admitted the military's involvement and the coercive nature of the sexual slavery, crying that "the government's direct involvement should not be admitted". This can never be overlooked.
					
					 The sexual slavery has stigmatized Japan.
					
					 It is another crime against humanity that the Japanese reactionaries are trying to avoid it with neither apology nor reparation.
					
					 Papers found out by Professor of Kanto Gakuin College Hayashi at the Tokyo tribunal archives and "Secret document No. 118" that was found at a historical records room of Japan's Defense Ministry and other evidential data clarify that the heinous sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army were forced under the direct involvement of the government and the military that moved by the order and ratification of the Japanese Emperor.
					
					 With nothing can Japan cover up the crime and shirk the responsibility.
					
					 If the Japanese reactionaries keep denying history despite strong protest and denunciation of the international community, they will meet the miserable result of ruining their country's future of their own accord.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills under Fire
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint War Drills under Fire 
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), made public a statement on Friday. 
					 The statement accused the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet regime of kicking off the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises despite the strong protest and denunciation at home and abroad. 
					
					 All the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan vehemently denounce the thrice-cursed saber-rattling kicked off by them to bring a nuclear war disaster to all Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. let the south Korean regime of traitors cook up the extra-large terrorism unprecedented in history and stage the large war exercises. This shows that their aggressive nature for stifling the DPRK remains unchanged and the military standoff in the peninsula has reached the extreme phase owing to the new defense strategy for aggression. 
					
					 What cannot be overlooked is that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, more dead than alive being forsaken by all the Koreans, turned south Korea into battle fields as war servants for the U.S. imperialists to prolong its dirty remaining days. 
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, inspecting island defence detachments stationed in the biggest hotspot in the southernmost part of the southwest front, ordered to deal at once deadly counter-blows at the enemy if even a single shell is dropped on the waters or in the area of the DPRK, and lead the battle to a sacred war for national reunification. Upon this order the army and people of the homeland are full of the will to wipe out the enemies. 
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will firmly defend the homeland of Juche together with the people in the homeland firmly believing in Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Conservative Forces Accused of Supporting "Yusin" Dictatorship in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conservatives Accused of Supporting "Yusin" Dictatorship in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- More than 30 civic and social organizations in south Korea including the Society of April Revolution and the Association for Inheriting Movement of the League of Democratic Youths and Students on August 22 held a press conference in Seoul to denounce the conservatives for supporting the "yusin" dictatorship.
					 Speakers at the conference recalled that it is 40 years since the "October yusin" was fabricated.
					
					 The "yusin regime" enforced a dictatorial rule, mercilessly violating the people's right to existence and human rights, they noted.
					
					 They accused Park Geun Hye of making desperate efforts to justify the "yusin" dictatorship, cover up the crimes committed by the dictatorial forces against the people and hold "the presidential" seat. 
					
					 They recalled that the pro-democracy figures who fought against the military dictatorship of Park Chung Hee in the period between the 1960s and 1970s formed "Democratic Action for Eradicating Yusin Remnants and Achieving Justice of History," declaring that the revival of the fascist dictatorship is intolerable.
					
					 They declared that they would stage actions for eliminating the remnants of "yusin" keen to revive dictatorship and distort history.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Korean A-bomb Victims Held
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Korean A-bomb Victims Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A memorial service for Koreans in Japan killed by A-bomb explosions was held in front of the monument to the Korean victims in Nagasaki City of Japan on August 9.
					 Present there were Kim Jong Gu, chairman of the Nagasaki Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Kwak Kwi Hun, honorary chairman of the south Korean "Association for A-bomb Victims", Ri Thae Jae, chairman of the south Korean "Society of Second Generation of A-bomb Victims", Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the victims.
					
					 At the service Kim Jong Gu said after being abducted and taken away to Japan by the Japanese imperialists Koreans were subject to inhuman treatment, contempt and all sorts of hard labor and mercilessly killed by A-bomb explosions in the end.
					
					 The issue of Korean A-bomb victims was a product of the colonial rule of the Japanese imperialists and a matter closely linked with the issue of Japan's liquidation of its past crimes, he noted.
					
					 He called for tenacious actions to facilitate the process for normalizing the relations between the DPRK and Japan in the basic spirit of the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and put into force a relief measure for the A-bomb victims in Korea.
					
					 A letter to the Japanese government was read out there.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's Work Held in Democratic Congo
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Effect Kim Jong Il's Patriotism and Step Up the Building of a Prosperous Country" was held by the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo on August 11.
					 The work was read out by the president of the Association who is also chairman of the National Coordinating Committee of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of the association to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The deputy coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il set an example of patriotism while wisely leading the Korean people's struggle for defending the country and achieving its prosperity.
					
					 He always had his beloved country and its people in his mind.
					
					 He performed great exploits for the times and history, dedicating his life to the country and its people.
					
					 He set forth the principle of Songun which calls for putting forward the People's Army as a driving force for protecting the sovereignty of socialist Korea and led the army and people of the DPRK to fulfill their missions and tasks for defending the country.
					
					 His absolute trust in and love for people generated tremendous might of single-minded unity in the DPRK and this served as a source of inexhaustible strength which no nuclear weapons can ever overpower.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism is fully reflected in the slogan "Let Us Live Not Merely for Today but for Tomorrow!"
					
					 This slogan teaches not only the Korean people but the world progressives how they should live and work to love and glorify their country.

articles.title: Songun Idea Praised by Political Party, Organizations in Peru
articles.content:
Songun Idea Praised by Political Party, Organizations in Peru
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Political party and organizations in Peru released statements to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union and the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute issued a joint statement on August 18.
					
					 The joint statement said President Kim Il Sung laid down the line for defeating Japanese imperialism by force of arms in the early period of his revolutionary activities, giving origin to the history of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Since Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership on August 25, 1960, he had invariably adhered to the line of Songun while leading the revolution and construction for more than half a century, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Thanks to his Songun leadership, socialist Korea could defend socialism despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it in the middle of the 1990s.
					
					 It is foolish, indeed, for the U.S. imperialists and their followers to talk about "change" and "collapse," still remaining ignorant of the DPRK's invariable will to pursue Songun and its might.
					
					 Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Marshal Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, is creditably carrying forward the Songun idea of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il. This idea serves as an ever-victorious banner of the DPRK.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the struggle of the WPK and the Korean people vigorously advancing towards a final victory under the uplifted banner of Songun, united close behind Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The Peruvian Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its statement on August 17 said the exploits of Kim Jong Il who bolstered up the national power of socialist Korea in every way by dint of Songun would last forever.
					
					 The committee expressed conviction that the Korean people would surely emerge victorious in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation, reunify the country and accomplish the cause of independence against imperialism under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Anniversary Marked in India, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Anniversary Marked in India, Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Events took place in India and Ethiopia on August 13 and 14 to celebrate the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 They were a seminar, book and photo exhibitions and film show hosted by the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea and a lecture by a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing the greatness of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their revolutionary exploits.
					
					 Also displayed there were works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, books and photos on the development of Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The participants in the film show watched Korean film "Arms of Korea".
					
					 The chairman of the Indian Intellectuals' Society for the Study of the Juche Idea said Kim Il Sung terminated the Japanese imperialists' military occupation over Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il who inherited the cause of Kim Il Sung defeated the imperialists' moves to stifle the country by dint of Songun and turned it into a political, ideological and military power possessed of nuclear deterrent, he added.
					
					 The Korean people hold supreme leader Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, in high esteem as Marshal of the DPRK, he said, adding rosy is the future of the DPRK that is building a thriving socialist nation under his leadership.
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian Youth Study Group of the Juche Idea said in the lecture that Korea's liberation amounted to the victory of the adroit guerrilla tactics of Kim Il Sung, legendary guerrilla commander.
					
					 His exploits will be brilliantly recorded in the world history of the struggle for national liberation in colonial countries, the chief added.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Newspapers and Internet homepages of different countries carried special write-ups with photos of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the 67th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The 30th issue of the Russian newspaper Patriot in an article titled "Victory" said that Kim Il Sung embarked on the road of revolution and achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation through the hard-fought anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who was raised in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary war and the Fatherland Liberation War, performed  great exploits for the country and the people with his original Songun politics and thus made the revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung shine in the world, the article said, adding the dear respected Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward the tradition of victories provided by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Pracheachon on Aug. 15 carried an article praising the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung in liberating Korea.
					
					 The Internet homepage of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy in an article titled "General Kim Il Sung, peerless patriot" on Aug. 13 praised him as the sun of Juche and extraordinary legendary hero and peerless patriot who achieved the historic cause of Korea's liberation, adding:
					
					 The progressive mankind are looking up to Kim Il Sung as not only the liberator of the Korean nation but talented strategist, peerlessly brilliant commander, benevolent father of all people and great leader.
					
					 His exploits are shining more brightly as the DPRK holds Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, in high esteem.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked Abroad
						
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Media of different countries gave wide publicity to leader Kim Jong Il's exploits from Aug. 13 to 18 on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of his start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The Mexican paper Unidad Nacional devoted one whole page to an article titled "Kim Jong Il authored a lot of works in the whole period of leading the Workers' Party of Korea" with a photo of him standing together with the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The paper expounded in detail the fact that Kim Jong Il published many works scientifically clarifying all the theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Nepali paper Arpan edited an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership and modern Korea" and other articles illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Young Communist League of Russia posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Songun brilliant commander" with his photo, saying that he was a great man possessed of wisdom, stratagem and pluck as the Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 The U.S. kicked up the cases of "Pueblo" spy ship, "EC-121" large spy airplane, Panmunjom case, etc., bringing about a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula but every time it suffered shameful defeats, the article said, adding this clearly proved that Kim Jong Il was the peerless Songun brilliant commander.
					
					 The MS Travel Agency of Germany on its Internet homepage posted an article dealing with the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il under the headline of "Immortal exploits of the Songun revolutionary leadership".
					
					 The Apsara TV and Radio and F.M. 90.5 Radio of Cambodia made commemoration reports on the above-said occasion.

articles.title: Delegados juveniles rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegados juveniles rinden homenaje a Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- En reflejo de la unanime fidelidad de vanguardistas juveniles de todo el pais, los delegados a los actos por el Dia de la Juventud depositaron este sabado un cesto y ramos de flores al pie de las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il erguidas en la colina Mansu.
					Los participantes rindieron el postumo homenaje a los grandes hombres del monte Paektu quienes al presentar la consigna "!Amen a los jovenes!" orientaron paso a paso a los jovenes coreanos para que se formen como creadores de proezas que brillaran eternamente en la historia y como combatientes de vanguardia de la epoca.

articles.title: CRPP revela la verdad del caso de Jang Jun Ha
articles.content:
CRPP revela la verdad del caso de Jang Jun Ha
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 25 la informacion no. 1008 que sigue:
					Recientemente, fueron descubiertas las pruebas de asesinato a Jang Jun Ha, cometido hace varios decenios por el "regimen" tirano de "renovacion", desatando la gran indignacion y consternacion en distintos sectores del Sur de Corea.
					
					Jang Jun Ha es renombrada personalidad opositora quien lucho desde los dias posteriores a la liberacion de Corea (15 de agosto de 1945) contra el "poder" dictatorial de Syngman Rhee y la camarilla militar fascista de Park Chung Hee dedicandose a escribir articulos de caracter progresista.
					
					Lucho indoblegablemente por la democracia y la reunificacion enfrentandose de frente a frente al dictador de "renovacion" y fallecio en agosto de 1975 por causas sospechosas.
					
					Entonces, el "regimen" de "renovacion" habia reportado que Jang murio durante el alpinismo al caerse de un barranco.
					
					Nadie creia ese reporte y sus familiares y las entidades correspondientes surcoreanas demandaron varias veces el esclarecimiento del caso. Sin embargo, el incidente estuvo pendiente hasta la fecha debido a las medidas obstruccionistas de la banda de autoridades conservadoras.
					
					Durante el reciente traslado de los restos mortales del escritor fallecido al nuevo "Parque Jang Jun Ha", se descubrieron en su craneo un hueco abierto por el impacto de martillazo y los rastros de reventon y el resultado del examen forense revelo que su muerte fue un homicidio.
					
					Asi se conocio a los 37 anos la verdad del caso de asesinato de Jang Jun Ha.
					
					Ahora, los partidos opositores incluyendo al Partido Unido Democratico y diversos sectores sociales condenan fuertemente esa barbarie y demandan a Park Geun-hye, hija de Park Chung Hee, que renuncie su candidatura presidencial.
					
					Los familiares del difunto exigen fuertemente el esclarecimiento consecuente del caso.
					
					Perpleja ante tal situacion, la banda de conservadores en el poder recurre a todas las artimanas para esquivar las condenas de la opinion publica diciendo que "ya fue esclarecido el caso de Jang Jun Ha" y "no cambiara el resultado aunque se repita la investigacion".
					
					El caso de Jang Jun Ha es otro testimonio de la atrocidad y ferocidad de la dictadura de "renovacion".
					
					Es uno de muchos incidentes de terrorismo politico cometidos por el dictador de "renovacion", tales como el caso de secuestro a Kim Dae Jung, el caso de partido revolucionario popular y Jang Jun Ha es uno de millones de victimas conocidas y desconocidas.
					
					Llega al cielo el rencor de los habitantes surcoreanos heridos por la dictadura de "renovacion".
					
					Hay que liquidarse sin falta los crimenes antieticos de la dictadura de "renovacion" y el Sur de Corea no debe volver jamas a la epoca de dictadura de "renovacion" que fue una pesadilla.
					
					Jamas sera tolerado el renacimiento de la dictadura de "renovacion".
					
					Los habitantes surcoreanos de diversos estratos deben movilizarse como un solo hombre en la lucha por exterminar a los descendientes de la "renovacion" y otros elementos de dictadura fascista que tratan de dar marcha atras a la historia desafiando a la epoca.

articles.title: Bailes de jovenes coreanos por 25 de agosto
articles.content:
Bailes de jovenes coreanos por 25 de agosto
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 52o aniversario del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, tuvieron lugar este sabado en varios lugares del pais los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes.
					Con la infinita anoranza al Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quien condujo a la victoria el ejercito y pueblo coreanos, ellos bailaron en las explanadas frente al Monumento a la Fundacion del Partido, la Casa Cultural 25 de Abril, el Palacio de Deportes de Pyongyang etc.
					
					Las canciones "Nuestro General es el mejor", "Su ideal", "Adelante los jovenes, siguiendo al partido" y otras redoblaron el jubilo y la pasion de los bailadores.
					
					Ellos bailaron apasionadamente cantando las canciones "Seamos soldados del General", "Defenderemos a costa de la vida al General       Kim Jong Un", etc.
					
					Los bailes de los jovenes y estudiantes, realizados en Hamhung, Wonsan y otras localidades, demostraron bien la ferrea determinacion de vanguardistas juveniles del Songun de avanzar hacia la victoria final uniendose monoliticamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Delegados jovenes presencian "Arirang"
articles.content:
Delegados jovenes presencian "Arirang"
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los delegados a los festejos del Dia de la Juventud presenciaron el dia 25 en el Estadio Primero de Mayo la funcion gimnastico-artistica masiva "Arirang", laureada con el Premio Kim Il Sung.
					Acompanaron en verla los militares del EPC, los trabajadores de diversos estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes, los compatriotas residentes en ultramar y los huespedes extranjeros.
					
					La funcion conmovio desde el principio a los espectadores mostrando el pasado, el presente y el futuro prospero de la nacion coreana.
					
					Los ejecutantes elogiaron la vida revolucionaria y hazanas inmortales de los Generalisimos             Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, quienes construyeron en suelo patrio una potencia socialista independiente, autarquica y autodefensiva y elevaron a la vista del mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la nacion.
					
					Dejo imborrable impresion a los espectadores la funcion que a traves de nuevas musicas, el cambio de formacion y particulares movimientos y reflejo el amor al pueblo y a las generaciones venideras del PTC y el contenido de que se levantaron la Central Hidroelectrica de Huichon, el Teatro del Pueblo y otras creaciones monumentales.
